item.title: Deleting/Renaming Text Files

item.description:
@razorback wrote:

Hey guys. I know Iâ€™m completely wrong with this code, but I gave it a try anyway. I want to delete a text file, and rename a text file, and create a new text file. This is what I have so far.

File S2 = new File("./Data/Scores2.txt");

		if(rename1.delete()) {
